name: Leech-Clipper
summary: You are trained to capture deserters, or “leeches”.
description:
You are trained to capture deserters, or “leeches.” If you critically hit a foe with a weapon from the flail weapon group, you can wrap the weapon around the target’s legs and then drop it, causing the foe to take a –10-foot circumstance penalty to their Speeds until they or their allies disentangle the weapon, which takes a total of 2 Interact actions.Traits

Hobgoblin: Hobgoblins are a sturdy, clever people with a propensity for militaristic order
